SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Class HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.repository.HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
public class HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryImpl extends Object implements HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
Implementation of custom repository methods for managing security holdings and position calculations.

Security Holdings Management:

This class handles the creation and maintenance of time-based security holding records that track position changes from buy/sell transactions, corporate actions, and stock splits. Holdings are automatically updated when securities transactions occur.

Holdings Impact Scenarios:

  • When a tenant buys or sells a security
  • When a tenant's global main currency or portfolio currency changes
  • When security splits occur (affects all tenants holding the security)

Margin vs. Regular Transactions:

Margin transactions are handled differently - every single transaction is processed individually, while regular transactions use combined daily results from database queries grouped by security and security account.

Position Management:

Opening and closing a position within the same day will not produce a holding record, as the net position change is zero. Holdings are only created when there is a non-zero position at the end of processing.

  • Method Details

    • createSecurityHoldingsEntireForAllTenant

      @Transactional @Modifying public void createSecurityHoldingsEntireForAllTenant()
      Description copied from interface: HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Creates complete security holdings for all tenants in the system.

      This method performs a full rebuild of security holdings time-frames for every tenant. It processes all securities transactions across all security accounts and creates holding periods that accurately represent position changes over time.

      Specified by:
      createSecurityHoldingsEntireForAllTenant in interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom

    • createSecurityHoldingsEntireByTenant

      @Transactional @Modifying public void createSecurityHoldingsEntireByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Description copied from interface: HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Security holdings are completely rebuild for a tenant.

      This method rebuilds all security holdings time-frames for the specified tenant, processing all historical securities transactions and creating accurate holding periods. It removes existing holdings for the tenant before recalculating from scratch.

      Transaction Processing:

      The method processes various transaction types including:

      • Buy and sell transactions
      • Stock splits and stock dividends
      Specified by:
      createSecurityHoldingsEntireByTenant in interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant identifier for which to rebuild security holdings

    • adjustSecurityHoldingForSecurityaccountAndSecurity

      public void adjustSecurityHoldingForSecurityaccountAndSecurity(Securityaccount securityaccount, Transaction transaction, boolean isAdded)
      Description copied from interface: HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Adjust security holding for a single transaction.

      This method provides efficient incremental updates when a securities transaction is added, modified, or removed. It identifies the affected time period and recalculates only the necessary holding records from that point forward, preserving earlier holdings that remain valid.

      Incremental Processing:

      The method determines the impact date from the transaction and:

      • Preserves holdings before the transaction date
      • Removes and recalculates holdings from the transaction date onward
      • Updates quantity, cost basis, and valuation calculations
      • Maintains proper time-frame continuity
      Specified by:
      adjustSecurityHoldingForSecurityaccountAndSecurity in interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      securityaccount - the security account containing the affected security
      transaction - the transaction that triggered the holding adjustment
      isAdded - true if the transaction was added, false if removed or modified

    • rebuildHoldingsForSecurity

      @Transactional public void rebuildHoldingsForSecurity(Integer idSecuritycurrency)
      Description copied from interface: HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Rebuilds holdings for a specific security across all tenants and accounts.

      This method is used when security-level changes occur that affect all holdings of that security, such as:

      • Stock splits or stock dividends
      • Historical price data corrections

      Scope:

      Unlike tenant-specific rebuilds, this method processes all holdings of the specified security across the entire system, ensuring consistency when security-level changes affect multiple accounts and tenants.

      Specified by:
      rebuildHoldingsForSecurity in interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idSecuritycurrency - the security identifier for which to rebuild holdings

    • getMissingQuotesWithSecurities

      public MissingQuotesWithSecurities getMissingQuotesWithSecurities(Integer year) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Description copied from interface: HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Identifies securities with missing historical quotes for performance calculations.

      This method analyzes security holdings for a specific year and identifies which securities are missing historical price data needed for accurate performance analysis and valuation calculations.

      Analysis Scope:

      The method examines:

      • Securities held during the specified year
      • Required trading days for complete analysis
      • Available historical quote data
      • Gaps in price history that affect calculations
      Specified by:
      getMissingQuotesWithSecurities in interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      year - the year for which to analyze missing quotes
      Returns:
      detailed information about securities with missing quote data
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if concurrent processing is interrupted
      ExecutionException - if an error occurs during concurrent analysis
